entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8.0 error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.ubuntu.22.04-x64. No packages exist with this id in source(s): nuget.org #40676
  • `dotnet tool install` doesn't respect `isRoot` property in manifest #40655

Closed

  • Add `dotnet tool update --all` option #10130
    8.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Add bootstrapper validation to clickonce test #40683
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40678
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix doc typo in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.CSharp.targets #40504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
